mapper.select: select r.id,r.title,r.create_time as createTime from reading r left join user_reading_record u on r.id = u.reading_id where u.uid = #{id} group by r.id
select l.id,l.title,l.create_time as createTime from listening l left join user_listening_record u on l.id = u.listening_id where u.uid = #{id} group by l.id
